title: Crane Hill (Walton, Delaware County, New York)
text: Crane Hill is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in the <a href="Catskill%20Mountains">Catskill Mountains</a> of <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a> southwest of <a href="Walton%2C%20New%20York">Walton</a>. <a href="Walton%20Mountain%20%28New%20York%29">Walton Mountain</a> is located northwest, <a href="South%20Mountain%20%28Delaware%20County%2C%20New%20York%29">South Mountain</a> is located east, and <a href="Bear%20Spring%20Mountain">Bear Spring Mountain</a> is located east of Crane Hill.
